</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Positioning

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns the width of the screen in screen measurement units. Taken from top left corner of the default viewport (0,0) of the screen and going in the same direction as the X axis, the value will be positive but resulting X will end up beyond the right border. Therefore in order to calculate X of the right screen border, the length of [[safeZoneX]] must be subtracted from [[safeZoneW]], but because it is negative, it must be added instead. <tt>_screenRightBorderX <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[safeZoneW]] + [[safeZoneX]]</tt>. The measurement units depend on the current screen resolution [[getResolution]]. See also [[SafeZone]]
[[Image:safezone.jpg|600px]]

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[safeZoneW]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Number]] - Screen width in screen measurement units

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value>  <code>_screenWidth = [[safeZoneW]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value>  <code>_screenLeftBorderX = [[safeZoneX]];
_screenRightBorderX = [[safeZoneW]] + [[safeZoneX]];</code>

</value></part><part><name> x3</name>=<value> Create control 50% wide, 30% tall, centered on screen:<code>[[private]] _ctrl = [[findDisplay]] 46 [[createDisplay]] "RscDisplayEmpty" [[ctrlCreate]] ["RscText", -1];
_ctrl [[ctrlSetBackgroundColor]] [1,0,0,0.5];
[[private]] _ctrlWidth = 0.5 * [[safeZoneW]]; // 50% of screen width
[[private]] _ctrlHeight = 0.3 * [[safeZoneH]]; // 30% of screen height
_ctrl [[ctrlSetPositionW]] _ctrlWidth; 
_ctrl [[ctrlSetPositionH]] _ctrlHeight;
_ctrl [[ctrlSetPositionX]] (([[safeZoneW]] - _ctrlWidth) / 2 + [[safeZoneX]]); // center it horizontally
_ctrl [[ctrlSetPositionY]] (([[safeZoneH]] - _ctrlHeight) / 2 + [[safeZoneY]]); // center it vertically
_ctrl [[ctrlCommit]] 0;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[SafeZone]], [[safeZoneX]], [[safeZoneY]], [[safeZoneH]], [[safeZoneXAbs]], [[safeZoneWAbs]]
</value></part></template></root>
